search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Jotform (jotform.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Jotform is: [https://www.jotform.com/pricing/](https://www.jotform.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

Why Choose Jotform?
-------------------

![Image 83: A person in a green shirt waters a tree while a brown dog with a red collar watches](https://cdn.jotfor.ms/p/pricing/assets/img/pricing/nonprofit.svg)

50%DISCOUNT

### Nonprofit Discount

Whether your nonprofit is large or small, Jotform’s online Form Builder helps your organization help others. It takes just a few minutes to create and publish your forms online. As an exclusive benefit, we offer nonprofits a 50-percent discount!

[Learn More](https://www.jotform.com/nonprofit/pricing/?jtm_source=pricing-above-test&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=nonprofit-discount-text)

### Education Discount

Jotform is the preferred online Form Builder for educational institutions around the world — from major universities to K–12 schools. With Jotform, you can easily create an education form that meets your needs. As an exclusive benefit, we offer educational institutions a 50-percent discount!

[Learn More](https://www.jotform.com/education/pricing/?jtm_source=pricing-above-test&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=education-discount-text)

![Image 84: A graduate in a gown holds a diploma joyfully, with a desk and computer in the background](https://cdn.jotfor.ms/p/pricing/assets/img/pricing/education.svg)

50%DISCOUNT

![Image 85: A person reads a 'NEWS' newspaper with coffee on a red armchair, with a power switch and document icons in the background](https://cdn.jotfor.ms/p/pricing/assets/img/pricing/cancel.svg)

### Cancel Anytime

Jotform is a recurring subscription service. You can upgrade or downgrade your service at any time. To change your subscription, go to the [billing page](https://www.jotform.com/myaccount/billing?jtm_source=pricing&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=billing-page) and select a new plan.

### 30 Day Money Back Guarantee

If, for any reason, you need to cancel your subscription within 30 days of payment, we’ll issue a full refund. To request a refund, please contact our [support team](https://www.jotform.com/contact/?jtm_source=pricing&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=contact-page).

![Image 86: Illustration of a man relaxing on soft clouds, smiling with sunglasses on](https://cdn.jotfor.ms/p/pricing/assets/img/pricing/money-back.svg)

Fortune 500 companies

Jotform Pricing FAQ
-------------------

*   ### What plans and pricing tiers does Jotform offer?
    
    Jotform offers several plans, including Starter (free), Bronze, Silver, and Gold plans. Jotform also offers Enterprise plans with custom pricing for large organizations. Storage and submission limits increase with each level.
    
*   ### Is there a free plan available for Jotform?
    
    Yes, the Starter plan is best for individuals or small teams just starting their data-collection journeys. The Starter plan includes all standard [features](https://www.jotform.com/features/), such as [form templates](https://www.jotform.com/form-templates/), [payment integrations](https://www.jotform.com/integrations/category/payment-processing), and widgets. You’ll need to switch to a paid plan to increase your limits. Keep in mind that your forms and signed documents will include Jotform branding, which can be removed once you have a paid subscription.
    
*   ### Who is the Bronze plan suitable for?
    
    The Bronze plan is the lowest-priced paid plan. This plan is ideal for startups or freelancers who are hitting the ground running with data collection and need more than the basics. With its generous limits, the Bronze plan allows you to manage your business smoothly.
    
*   ### Who is the Silver plan suitable for?
    
    The Silver plan provides the best value for small to mid-tier businesses. You can scale data management as your organization grows.
    
*   ### Who is the Gold plan suitable for?
    
    The Gold plan offers the highest limits (outside of Enterprise plans) for your Jotform account and provides optional [HIPAA compliance](https://www.jotform.com/hipaa/) features. Alongside integrations, widgets, group approvals, etc., you can create HIPAA-friendly forms and collect medical information and [electronic signatures](https://www.jotform.com/products/sign/) from your patients. All data is encrypted so you won’t need to worry about keeping PHI submitted through your forms secure.
    
*   ### Who is the Enterprise plan suitable for?
    
    The [Jotform Enterprise](https://www.jotform.com/enterprise/) plan is suitable for large organizations. It’s the only multiuser Jotform plan, and it provides additional functionality, including enhanced security, custom domains, Single Sign-On (SSO), HIPAA features, and more. For further information, please [contact us](https://www.jotform.com/enterprise/contact-sales/?jtm_medium=referral&jtm_source=jotform.com&jtm_campaign=enterprise_pricing&jtm_content=jotform_pricing_enterprise_column_bottom_cta).
    
*   ### Is there a trial period for paid plans?
    
    While there is no trial period for Jotform plans, you can try all of Jotform’s standard features with the Starter (free) plan (this excludes HIPAA compliance features). Once you exceed the limits of the Starter plan, you can upgrade your account in a few easy steps.
    
*   ### Jotform Subscription Periods
    
    You can select either a monthly or a yearly subscription. Your subscription will automatically be renewed each month for monthly plans and each year for yearly plans unless you cancel.
    
*   ### What are the benefits/advantages of yearly subscriptions?
    
    If you subscribe to a yearly plan, you can save up to 20% when compared to monthly subscriptions of Bronze, Silver, and Gold plans.
    
*   ### Does Jotform offer discounts for educational institutions or nonprofits?
    
    Yes! Jotform offers exclusive 50% discounts on Bronze, Silver, and Gold plans — both monthly and yearly subscriptions — for educational institutions and nonprofits. To claim your discount, apply for the [nonprofit discount](https://www.jotform.com/nonprofit/pricing/?jtm_source=pricing-above-test&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=nonprofit-discount-text), or the [education discount](https://www.jotform.com/education/pricing/?jtm_source=pricing-above-test&jtm_medium=text&jtm_campaign=website-internal&jtm_content=education-discount-text). Once approved, you’ll be able to take advantage of the 50% discount.
    
*   ### Are there any other discounts? Does Jotform have sales?
    
    Jotform offers [several discounts](https://www.jotform.com/discounts/) at different times of the year. These discounts are available only when upgrading to a higher tier yearly plan. The discounts aren’t available for your current plan. Plans will auto-renew at the full price in the next payment period.
    
*   ### What are the main benefits of upgrading to a paid plan?
    
    When you upgrade to a paid plan with Jotform, you’ll instantly get **higher limits**, allowing you to **collect more data** from the users driving your business. User data can ultimately lead to business insights that drive better decisions and save time, money, and resources.
    
*   ### What happens to my data if I exceed my plan’s limits?
    
    When you reach a usage limit, the system will send you a notification email and warn you on your dashboard. You can upgrade your subscription to increase your limits or delete and purge your form submissions to free up space.
    
    Please note that if you exceed your total submission storage, the system will delete the oldest form response to make room for new submissions. To avoid losing data, you can download your old submissions and purge them. For detailed information, check out [this](https://www.jotform.com/help/408-understanding-your-account-usage-and-limits/) help guide.
    
*   ### What are the form usage metrics and limits that Jotform uses?
    
    **Form limit:** The form limit refers to the maximum number of forms that can be active on your plan.
    
    **Usage limit:** The usage limit is the maximum number of times you can use a feature. Only the API call limit resets daily.
    
    **Submission limit:** A form submission is the data collected when a user successfully completes a form. The submission limit refers to the total number of form responses from all forms that your account can support on a monthly basis.
    
    **Form view limit:** The form view limit refers to the total number of times your forms can be viewed account-wide on a monthly basis. For more information, see [Form View Limits](https://www.jotform.com/help/355-form-view-limits-what-is-it-all-about/).
    
    **Form field limit:** A form field is an element of a form, such as a text box, calculator, or signature field. The form field limit refers to the maximum number of elements and/or widgets allowed on a form.
    
    **Payment submission limit:** A payment submission is a submission through a form that accepts payment via Jotform’s payment integrations. The payment submission limit is the total number of valid payments you collect with your forms on a monthly basis.
    
    **Signed document limit:** The signed document limit refers to the total number of e-signature documents you receive on your account every month.
    
    **Total submission storage:** Total submission storage refers to the maximum number of form submissions you can store in your account.
    
    **Upload space:** Upload space is the available disk space you can use to store files uploaded to your forms. To free up upload space, you can delete and then purge any of your form entries that include file uploads.
    
    **HIPAA compliance features:** HIPAA compliance features are optional features, such as encryption, auditing, and PHI segmentation, that you can use to help make sure your forms comply with HIPAA regulations. These features are available on **Gold and Enterprise plans only.**
    
    **Jotform branding:** Forms built by users on Jotform’s Starter plan include Jotform branding. Users on other Jotform plans can remove this branding and replace it with their own.
    
*   ### Which payment methods does Jotform accept for its plans?
    
    Jotform accepts payments via credit/debit card or PayPal.
    
*   ### Which currencies does Jotform support?
    
    Jotform charges its users in U.S. dollars or euros, depending on where you are located. If you’re located in Europe, you’re charged in euros. Those in the rest of the world are charged in U.S. dollars. Please note that you can see your converted local currency amount on your bank/credit card receipt.
    
*   ### Does the price include tax?
    
    All payments made to Jotform will automatically include tax in the final price to comply with local regulations. If you have a valid Tax ID, tax will be removed from your transaction during the checkout process. If you have a Tax Exempt Certificate, please [contact support](https://www.jotform.com/contact/) to share your certificate, and we will handle it accordingly.
    
*   ### Upgrades/downgrades/cancellations
    
    You can upgrade your plan at any time, and your limits will increase immediately. Any additional features included with your new plan will be available as soon as you upgrade. When upgrading your subscription, the unused time on your previous plan will be applied to your new plan, and you will pay a prorated subscription rate.
    
    When you downgrade to a plan with lower limits, these will be effective immediately. The unused time on your plan will be added to your account as a balance and will be used for your next invoice.
    
    If you would like to cancel your subscription and move to the Starter (free) plan, follow [this guide](https://www.jotform.com/help/341-how-to-cancel-a-subscription-and-downgrade-back-to-free/). When you cancel a paid plan, you will still stay on your existing plan until the next billing date, and then you will be downgraded to the Starter plan.
    
*   ### How is my data protected?
    
    Your data is safe with Jotform. Jotform uses Google Cloud and AWS for all our data center hosting needs and doesn’t maintain any in-house servers. Also, Jotform complies with the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA). Please visit the [Jotform security page](https://www.jotform.com/security/) to learn more about it.
    
*   ### What are the AI agents usage metrics and limits that Jotform has?
    
    Jotform’s AI Agent usage metrics and limits include several key parameters. The AI Agent limit defines the maximum number of active AI Agents in your account. Monthly Conversations refer to the total AI Agent conversations allowed per month, including both chat and phone interactions. Monthly Sessions cover chatbot views, page refreshes, and phone call starts, even if no active user interaction occurs. Monthly Voice Calls represent the total minutes AI Agents can use for phone or web call interactions each month. Monthly SMS specifies the maximum number of user SMS messages sent to all AI Agents in your account per month. The Knowledge Base limit determines the total character count for knowledge resources across all AI Agents, including plain text, documents, Q&As, and URLs. Additionally, you can opt for a Dedicated Phone Number (Phone Number Add-On) for an extra fee to provide personalized services to your customers.
    
*   ### What is the difference between a Voice Call and a Phone Call?
    
    In terms of AI Agents, a phone call refers to calls made using a Dedicated Phone Number or a Regular Number with an extension number. These calls go through traditional telephony systems and require an actual phone number to connect.
    
    On the other hand, a voice call is a web-based call made through a platform without using a Dedicated Phone Number. It operates over the internet rather than through a traditional phone network.
    
    It’s important to note that the Monthly Voice Call Limit is shared between both Voice Calls and Phone Calls, meaning usage of either type will count towards the same limit.
    
*   ### What is AI Agent’s Phone Number Add-on and what are its features?
    
    ​The Phone Number Add-on provides a dedicated phone number for your AI agent, enabling it to handle calls seamlessly. This feature ensures that your AI agent can interact with customers over voice, offering a more personalized experience. Calls made using this dedicated number count toward the shared Voice Call Limit.
    
*   ### What are the period options for the Phone Number Add-on?
    
    The Phone Number Add-on is available with two subscription period options: Monthly and Yearly. You can choose the plan that best fits your needs. However, please note that you can save up to 20 percent off if you choose the yearly subscription model.
    
*   ### Can I buy a Dedicated Phone Number Add-on on Jotform’s Starter plan?
    
    Yes, you can purchase the Dedicated Phone Number Add-on on our Starter plan. The add-on is available as an additional feature regardless of your subscription plan.
    
*   ### How can I reactivate my previous Phone Number?
    
    Unfortunately, you can’t reactivate a previous phone number. Once a phone number is deactivated or the subscription is canceled, it cannot be reclaimed. You will need to purchase a new Dedicated Phone Number Add-on if you need a new number, but it won’t be the same as your previous one.
    
*   ### Can I use my AI agent with an Extension Number?
    
    Yes, you can use your AI agent with an Extension Number found on the Publish tab of your Agent. However, please note that it may be challenging since callers will need to manually enter the extension to reach your agent. This process can be time-consuming and may affect the user experience.
    
*   ### Which country phone number can I use with the Dedicated Phone Number?
    
    You can select a Dedicated Phone Number from the United States, United Kingdom, or Canada. These numbers can be purchased globally and are accessible to callers worldwide.
    
*   ### Can I choose a specific area code for my AI Agent’s phone number?
    
    If you select the United States or Canada as the country when purchasing a dedicated phone number, you can also select an area code.
    
*   ### Are the Dedicated Phone Number Add-ons one-time purchases?
    
    No, Dedicated Phone Number Add-ons are recurring subscriptions unless canceled. They will renew automatically based on the selected monthly or yearly billing cycle.
    
*   ### How can I manage my phone number subscription?
    
    You can manage your phone number subscription by going to your Jotform account Settings and navigating to the Billing section. From there, you can update or cancel your subscription as needed.
    
*   ### How do AI Agents improve data accuracy?
    
    AI Agents improve data accuracy by validating inputs in real-time and formatting user responses according to the required structure of a form. This reduces manual errors and enhances data consistency.
    
*   ### How secure is the data handled by AI Agents?
    
    Jotform AI Agents adhere to industry-standard security protocols, ensuring that all data collected and processed is secure and encrypted.
    
*   ### What AI service does AI Agents use?
    
    Jotform AI Agents use OpenAI’s GPT-4, hosted in a secure cloud environment, to provide responses.
    
*   ### What are the security measures of the AI service?
    
    OpenAI’s GPT-4 is designed with enterprise-grade security, including encryption of data in transit and at rest and features supporting compliance with major regulations, like GDPR.
    
*   ### Are AI Agents compliant with GDPR/CCPA?
    
    Jotform AI Agent features support compliance with global data protection regulations, ensuring transparency and control over personal data.
    
*   ### Are AI Agents HIPAA-friendly?
    
    Yes, we utilize Google’s Gemini Models via Vertex AI for our HIPAA-compliant accounts, as it provides a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) to ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations.
    
    [Learn more](https://www.jotform.com/help/500-how-to-enable-hipaa-compliance/) how Jotform enables HIPAA compliance.
    
*   ### Does Jotform use the data collected through AI Agents to improve its services?
    
    Jotform doesn’t use the data collected through AI Agents to improve its services or for any other purposes, as stated in our [Privacy Policy](https://www.jotform.com/privacy/). Data collected from AI Agents is kept private, though we may share your data with AI providers such as OpenAI — but in any case it will be kept secure. Your form and form field content is used to train your personal AI Agents, but your name and other personal data won’t be used for such purposes. Learn more about Jotform AI Agents’s [security features](https://www.jotform.com/ai/agents/security/).
    
*   ### What are the main benefits of AI Agents?
    
    AI Agents offer many benefits that enhance user experience and operational efficiency. They are friendly, communicating with users in a polite, empathetic, approachable, and supportive manner to foster trust and create a positive interaction experience. With real-time support, AI Agents provide instant answers and guidance, improving user satisfaction. Their scalability allows them to handle large volumes of interactions across multiple channels without compromising quality. Through personalization, AI Agents adapt to user behavior and preferences to deliver tailored experiences. They also enhance automation by streamlining workflows and handling repetitive tasks like approvals and data entry. Lastly, AI Agents improve efficiency by saving time and reducing costs through intelligent automation, replacing manual processes with smarter solutions.
    
*   ### What are the main components of Jotform AI Agents?
    
    Jotform AI Agents consist of several complex and essential components that enhance their functionality. Functions define the core capabilities of AI Agents, enabling them to perform various tasks. Natural Language Processing (NLP) allows them to understand and respond to user queries effectively. The Knowledge Base stores important information that AI Agents use to provide accurate answers. A Decision-Making Engine helps process inputs and determine the best responses. Integrations enable seamless connections with other tools and platforms, while Customization Options allow users to tailor AI Agents to their specific needs. Avatars enhance user interaction by adding a visual identity. Multi-Channel Support ensures AI Agents can operate across different communication platforms. Data Security and Compliance protect user information and maintain privacy standards. A Personalization Engine adapts interactions based on user preferences, and a Training Module helps AI Agents continuously improve their performance.
